name: Aaron Ciaghi
title: Software Engineer
short_bio: Full-stack software engineer at NEW WORK SE (Xing) in sunny Barcelona with an academic background in computer science. My primary weapon of choice is Ruby on Rails but I also like venturing into front-end land with React. I'm currently working on re-building the Communities product of Xing, the leading professional social network for the DACH region. Before moving to Barcelona I worked 8 years, first as a PhD student and later as a researcher, at Fondazione Bruno Kessler in Trento (Italy) where I was the main developer of BringTheFood, a web application to support the Italian Food Bank and other organizations in managing food donations.

job_history.description: Maintaining the legacy Communities product and building its new incarnation from the ground up for Xing, the leading professional social network in the DACH region serving 19M+ users. Primarily working with the Ruby on Rails backend and React frontend of the Communities products, integrating them with the rest of the Xing platform, throwing GraphQL, Kafka, and occasionally even Scala into the mix.
